## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [GRMZM2G372364](https://www.maizegdb.org/gene_center/gene/GRMZM2G372364)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ZmCLE7</u>
- **Gene Name:** clavata3/esr-related7
- **Genome:** [B73_RefGen_v3](https://www.maizegdb.org/genome/assembly/B73%20RefGen_v3)
- **Species:** *Zea mays*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - CRISPR–Cas9 to edit maize CLE promoters and a newly characterized maize CLE gene identified through its compensatory upregulation in a **ZmCLE7** mutant.
   - This inversion allele led to an expanded expression of **ZmCLE7** in developing ear primordia, from the normal epidermal-enriched expression towards the centre of the IM.
   - As **ZmCLE7** and ZmFCP1 control meristem size, we observed roughly 5mm stage developing ear primordia in a subset of the alleles.
   - **ZmCLE7** promoter-edited alleles as heterozygotes with a null allele increase IM size.
   - At harvest, the fasciated ears of **ZmCLE7** null alleles are highly disorganized and shorter with much lower grain yield.
